attributes.action: ... refuse to give Thatcher a state funeral when she dies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Taken from the Facebook Group that this petition is based from:

"The Queen and Gordon Brown have today announced that the tax payers are going to shell out £3 million for a state funeral for Margaret Thatcher when she dies. This is the woman who destroyed British industry, communities all over the country for generations and created the absence of social housing that exists today as well as the privatisation of our cherised public services. If she has a state funeral it should only be allowed if she is buried alive!"

Link to Facebook Group: http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=19640827930

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
